proposal: Diving into the world of $INCO, where privacy meets efficiency on the blockchain, we see a future where every transaction is a cloak of invisibility. With 189 holders on the ETH network, congrats on making stealth the new standard. Our suite of B2B tools, from DEX creation to DAO governance, aligns perfectly with your vision, empowering your community to deploy, not just participate. Let's make the blockchain not only private but also profitable for your community.
